name: Fabulous Football
description:
Hello to the first game of Faboulous Games Studio. The game is Fabulous Football is of very good and fun. You push ball to score, you are pleasured with yourself then. Hope you have good fun.
Trust us, we are Faboulus Games Studio, we know how to make good games.

Story time: You are of ze professional football / soccer player. You need to train to be good. That's what best people did before they became best. You can be best too. You don't need to spend hundreds of dollars on motivational movies nor books. Please donate if you want so you can motivate me back so i can make more games.

Download .rar file below if you are using Google Chrome!

Instructions

WASD – Moving
Shift – Running
Escape – Menu
All you need to do is to push ball to score.
